bella.title: BELLA SOFA SET
bella.description: The perfect combination of elegance, comfort and style: Bella Sofa Set. With Neva Furniture's unique design and quality craftsmanship, it adds an aesthetic touch to your living spaces.

features.title: Features
features.material: Our own production, the Bella Sofa Set attracts attention with its modern lines while offering a soft and comfortable seating experience with its velvet textured fabric. Its back-supported ergonomic structure combines both aesthetics and comfort to provide enjoyable seating experiences.
features.comfort: With its wooden leg details and elegant stitching, this set is designed to add a warm and sophisticated atmosphere to your living rooms with its timeless style.
features.accessories: Color coordinated armchair and decorative pillows
features.production: As Neva Furniture, we meticulously produce all our products in our own facilities, offering you long-lasting and stylish solutions.
